objects.text:
• Authentic Dior luxury fragrance
• Sophisticated black glass bottle
• Long-lasting masculine scent
• Perfect blend of fresh woody notes

product_details.name: Dior Sauvage EDP - The Essence of Untamed Elegance
product_details.description:
• Authentic Dior luxury fragrance - Eau de Parfum concentration
• Sophisticated black glass bottle with emerald undertones
• Long-lasting masculine scent with superior silage
• Premium quality fragrance from the prestigious House of Dior
• Elegant ribbed cap design with magnetic closure
• Perfect blend of fresh and woody notes
• Ideal for both daily wear and special occasions
• Distinctive signature scent that commands attention
• Professional-grade atomizer for perfect distribution
• Luxurious packaging suitable for gifting

banner_details:
This banner design presents a luxurious and bold aesthetic suitable for a premium fragrance promotion. The background is a diagonally split gradient, combining deep navy and emerald green hues, creating a moody yet refined backdrop. At the center-right is a high-resolution image of the product inside a glass bottle, labeled under the ID `product_image`, scaled down to fit elegantly within the layout. 

Large, white uppercase text labeled `heading` announces the product name prominently while the `subheading` in a sleek emerald green font adds branding subtly underneath. A bullet list (`description`) in white provides key product features, emphasizing sophistication and masculine scent. The `price` element stands out in bold white numerals next to a stylish currency symbol, aided by a green `cta_button` labeled with `cta` text in white. A classy tagline in green below the list (`tagline`) reinforces the brand ethos.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Navy: #0B1F30
- Forest Green: #0A3738
- Emerald Green: #0a8e5d
- White: #FFFFFF
- Dark Bottle Black: #000000 (for product imagery contrast)
product_color: The product image for Dior Sauvage features a sophisticated and bold color palette dominated by deep midnight blue (#0E0F1A), emerald green highlights (#00FFB3), and glossy black (#1A1A1A). The white typography (#FFFFFF) adds high contrast, creating a sleek and legible look. The bottle's gradient transitions smoothly from dark blue/black at the top to green hues at the base, blending elegance with a hint of mystique. The green reflections on the glass provide a glow-like effect, making the product stand out. This palette conveys luxury, masculinity, and boldness, ideal for a high-end, modern advertisement banner.
